name: Mastercraft Smasher: Craft io
description:
Inspired by the classic Craftsman game series, Mastercraft Smasher: Craft io combines with the Smasher.io series to create a unique experience for you.
Have you ever wished to smash all the crafts into thousand of block craft? Surviving without building anything but smash 'em?

When you enter the battle arena, you are armed with a random weapon such as a hammer, sword, gun, etc... To win, you must destroy all enemies and become the last survival mastercraft. The more people you smash with that item, the bigger and stronger you become. Don’t let the enemies get too close or you will lose. Kill them all!

Too easy to play but not easy to win, huh?

GAME FEATURE
- Simple and funny io smasher game
- Impressive 3D cubic graphics
- Multiplayer battle royale in multicraft io game
- Various famous roles with awesome skins and skills
- Easy to control with only 1 finger
- Enjoy craft smashers in offline popular game
- All for free!

The game is an upgraded sequel to Mastercraft Smasher: Craft io with more expanded weapons and eye-catching graphics.

Download now for free!
